Posts.Content: i was diagnozed for breast cancer 2005, i did 8 sessions of chemo and was told that am cancer free, october of 2007 my cancer came back in my clavicle and was diagnosed bone cancer terminal my doctor said i will have 6 sessions of chemo and radiation..my 1st chemo i experienced very bad side effects...they wanted to give an injection to raised my WBC but it will be an out of pocket payment cost $3,000.00/injection...and everytime i have my chemo (every 3 weeks) my copay was $2,400.00...the cost made me more sick..my last chemo was 2/ 15 / 08..tumor markers 71..  that was my last chemo, my doctor don't want to give me chemo not until i have $2,400.00 (rest will be paid by my insurance)..i cannot afford the cost. when i went homei did all kind of research on the internet about alternative treatment..and started ordering books and buying and using B17,zeolite, sunchlorella,wakasa gold and some other supplements, change my food to organic, and have 4 glasses of carrots and oranges (with skin juice)..everyday and eat apricot seed daily..and of course my prayer..   5/09/08 had my tumor markers and blood test..everything turn out normal and my tumor markers...39 i continue what am doing..   finally i decided to see an alternative doctor..June 17 got my result from blood and urinary test June 23.. and found out that my tumor marker's was 38..   Dr. Meschi found out that my liver is congested, my kidney is not filtering and my stomach is producing too much antibodies..   If i continue my chemo..maybe i have only couple of months to live by now..because of the side effect on my other vital organs..   now am very very pleased and happy with Dr. Meschi i have my life back..and to my prayer warriors..i know am going to win this battle..   queenie
Posts.Title: alternative treatment
